name: monitoring-dashboard-samples
description: Samples for Cloud Monitoring Dashboards API

scripts.dev: cd scripts/dashboard-importer && npm run build && echo 'Dashboard tools are ready. Use one of the following scripts:' && echo '- npm run import -- <JSON_PATH> [PROJECT_ID]' && echo '- npm run test' && echo '- npm run upload -- <DIRECTORY> <PROJECT_ID>'

author: Google
